trans-unit.source: Used by data source controls when implementing the members defined by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> interface.
The ListSourceHelper class is a utility class provided to simplify implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface by data source controls.

Data source controls that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface but do not extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class can use the static ListSourceHelper methods in their own implementations of the methods defined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
Data source controls that extend from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class inherit these method implementations automatically.
Indicates whether the specified data source control contains a collection of data source view objects.
Use this method in an implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.ContainsListCollection%2A> property, passing a reference to a data source control.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> that specifies the data source control to test for associated data source view objects.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source control contains a collection of data source view objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Retrieves an <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of data source objects.
Use this method in an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A> method, passing a reference to a data source control.
The <xref:System.Collections.IList> object that is returned implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface.

You can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetItemProperties%2A> method to retrieve a list of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> descriptors that correspond to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> names associated with the data source control from the list.

An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> that contains one or more associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects, which are retrieved by a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames*>.

An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of one <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> has one or more associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
